feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 10:41 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then periods of snow and local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
